tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Doctor Who: Asylum of the Daleks - Behind the Scenes - Series 7 2012 Episode 1 - BBC One
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: http://www.bbc.co.uk/programmes/p00wqr14 From building the Daleks to blowing them up! With Matt Smith & Karen Gillan.

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: Am i the only one who cant figure out how that metal "egg" Rory﻿ drops bounces so much?!
Didn't Rory say that the doctor﻿ told him that it wouldn't effect him.
this is just like confidential﻿ bring it back!

There's one thing that's been bugging me.﻿ Now, I'm not one of those people who try to point out every single problem with Moffat's stories just 'cause it's Moffat, but I really haven't been able to make sense of this.
In Victory of the Daleks, the last 'bronze' Daleks were destroyed and replaced by the very brightly colored ones, right? How come there's so many of those bronze Daleks around, then? Did I miss something?
just bring back DWC﻿

They're not anymore. Amy only wanted to divorce him because she felt inadequate because she knew he wanted kids, and it hurt her to know she couldn't have them.﻿ They sort of patched that bit up on the teleport.
Haha, no problem! :)﻿
whovian﻿ and proud
I liked the first﻿ doctor who actor :(
Ee﻿
Well the doctor lies sometimes so that people dont worry about him or he didn't know﻿ it could effect him.
So why are Rory and Amy getting﻿ a divorce
OH no , now they've gone and spoiled it -﻿ THERE ARE MEN INSIDE the daleks!! Anamaria Marinca was top notch though!!
Eggs﻿
@martinwilliamrandall On todays menu we have specially prepared Elitism accompanied with side orders of assumption and patriotism and a large﻿ glass of whine.

In victory of the daleks, those daleks were impure so i assume that they were similar to the daleks in the series 1 finale, with human or other dna to create them. And﻿ the ones in the parliament are pure daleks so they weren't exterminated. Just my opinion and i can be wrong
Or maybe Oswin downloaded herself by nanobots into﻿ the Doctor.
Is this﻿ as close to confidential we'll get? :( PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE bring back confidential!!!!
Rule 1: The doctor lies..﻿
I'd love to﻿ play a dalek!
Yeah I thought BBC could get some cash to make doctor who﻿ with Daleks they don't need
On today's menu we have specially prepared Elitism accompanied with side orders of assumption and﻿ patriotism and﻿ a large glass of whine.
When﻿ I grow up, I wanna be a Dalek operator.
Shit i did... your﻿ saying a sentence that isn't what some dumb fucker just wrote... Sorry mate
It's sad they got rid of confidential. It's not like they're putting anything new on in it's place. Just repeats.﻿
